# videoQuality

**Instance Property**

The video quality to use when saving a trimmed movie.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var videoQuality: UIImagePickerController.QualityType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The available video qualities are described in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/QualityType] enumeration. The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/QualityType/typeLow].

If a user attempts to reencode a movie to a higher quality, the movie is saved at its existing quality. Reencoding never increases movie dimensions, frame rate, or bit rate.

## Configuring the editor

- **videoMaximumDuration**: The maximum duration, in seconds, permitted for trimmed movies saved by the video editor.
- **videoPath**: The filesystem path to the movie to be loaded by the video editor.
